issue.title: Arrows of `AxisVisual` are never removed from scene

content.raw:
There's some stuff in the linked commit which I initially thought would be needed for the fix but isn't required per se (the changes of `_msg->name()` to `linkVis->GetName()`), I do think it's cleaner though.

The actual fix is also deleting child visuals of the type `Visual::VT_GUI` in `Scene::RemoveVisualizations()`. I am sort of curious why there is type checking at all though - wouldn't it make more sense to delete child visuals of any type?
